messages.content: You are an AI assistant helping with fact comparison.

That statement is false. A cat is a mammal, specifically a small carnivorous mammal belonging to the Felidae family. Cats have distinct characteristics such as fur, retractable claws, and a keen sense of hearing and sight. Birds, on the other hand, are members of the class Aves and have features such as feathers, beaks, and the ability to fly (in most cases).
